EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Client Satisfaction Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Client_First_Name__c},
At Yodle, we are passionate about your success and are committed to continually improving the quality of the products and services we provide to you.
In that spirit, we would appreciate your feedback on Yodle by responding to a brief survey about your experience. This survey should take less than five minutes to complete and will help us reach our goal of making your program a success.
We know your time is valuable. As a “thank you” for your participation, we want you to enjoy a coffee on us. A gift card will be sent to this email address after completing the survey*.
To access the survey link, http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=1pcorlsyyc30n&q1={!Account.Id}
Thank you, Court Cunningham CEO of Yodle, Inc.
*In order to receive your free coffee we require that you complete the survey in full. You will receive your gift card via email within 30 days of completion.
